Rowdy Wolf:





Rowdy Wolf galloped at a pace that was smooth for him. He tried to keep up 
with KitKat the best his short-legged beast mode would. Dire wolves weren't 
the fastest, but he was skilled on stealth. He used it several times when he 
hunted out in the plains.

"Is there something I should know when I arrive?" he asked KitKat. "Perhaps 
a certain situation? I have never been in a group before."
